Umm, dumb question maybe but..

what is bootstrap?

It is a week full of activities by different departments of college on each day. You'll have mechanical workshop, will visit electronics lab and learn some stuff, a hackathon style design thinking event, and community service iirc. You get to sort of have a look at various departments and meet new people
